'''Everard Proudfoot''' is a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[The Shire]]. Everard Proudfoot was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]], where he was portrayed by [[Noel Appleby]].

==History==
Mr. Proudfoot was a grumpy old gaffer, who minded his own business and tended his garden. However, he enjoyed [[Gandalf]]'s fireworks and only expressed his disapproval when under the supervision of his wife. He was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{fotree}}</ref> He later met the [[Travellers|four hobbits]] as they returned home from their journey.<ref>{{rotkee}}</ref>
